Class Student

java.lang.Object
Student
public class Student
extends java.lang.Object
This is a Student class that represents a student in a college's student database.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    double GPA
    A double that contains the student's GPA on a 4.0 scale.
    java.lang.String name
    A string containing the student's full name.
    int studentID
    An integer containing the student's BYU ID.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Student​(java.lang.String name, int studentID, double GPA)
    The constructor for Student.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    double calculateGPA​(double numberOfCredits, double rawPoints)
    The calculateGPA method takes a student's total number of credits earned and their points received and calculates the GPA.
    boolean isStudentFailing()
    The isStudentFailing method checks the student's GPA to see fi they are failing.
    void sendStudentAnEmail()
    The sendStudentAnEmail sends an email to the student.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student​(java.lang.String name, int studentID, double GPA)
      The constructor for Student. Sets the name, studentID, and GPA fields.
      Parameters:
      name - The student's name
      studentID - The student's student ID
      GPA - The student's GPA

  • Method Details

    • calculateGPA

      public double calculateGPA​(double numberOfCredits, double rawPoints) throws java.lang.ArithmeticException
      The calculateGPA method takes a student's total number of credits earned and their points received and calculates the GPA.
      Parameters:
      numberOfCredits - The number of credits a student has taken
      rawPoints - The number of quality points the student received
      Returns:
      the student's GPA
      Throws:
      java.lang.ArithmeticException - if rawPoints is 0

    • isStudentFailing

      public boolean isStudentFailing()
      The isStudentFailing method checks the student's GPA to see fi they are failing.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the GPA is less than or equal to 2.0 and false otherwise.

    • sendStudentAnEmail

      public void sendStudentAnEmail()
      The sendStudentAnEmail sends an email to the student.
